类 IPAddressHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opendaylight.alto.commons.helper.IPAddressHelper

  • public class IPAddressHelper
extends Object
    This class handles IP address conversion.

      • ipv4ToInt

        public static int ipv4ToInt(String addr)
                     throws UnknownHostException
        Convert IPv4 address to 32-bit int.
        参数:
        addr -
        返回:
        Corresponding address in 32-bit int
        抛出:
        UnknownHostException

      • ipv6ToInt

        public static int[] ipv6ToInt(String address)
                       throws UnknownHostException
        Convert IPv6 address to 32-bit int array.
        参数:
        address -
        返回:
        Corresponding address in 32-bit int array.
        抛出:
        UnknownHostException

      • ipv6ToUniqueString

        public static String ipv6ToUniqueString(String address)
                                 throws UnknownHostException
        Convert equivalence IPv6 address to same string.
        参数:
        address -
        返回:
        Corresponding address in string.
        抛出:
        UnknownHostException
